author: Mitchell Foster
text:
I am a second year grad student at the University of Nevada, Reno and I am looking for someone to share a room with at the conference in Phoenix this year. Any takers?
Thanks
Mitch Foster
mwfoster@unr.edu
(231) 690-7609
title: Share a Room
